basicInfo.name: Lania
basicInfo.flavor: Lania became the true ruler of the Blizzard Plains by protecting the vast icy territory for many, many years.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Ice Shard
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 285% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Freeze. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 340% of Magic Attack.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: 35% Magic Attack Boost. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]

Skill 2.name: Blizzard
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 95% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 60% chance to inflict Freeze. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 115% of Magic Attack.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Increases Chance: Freeze chance becomes 70%.

Passive.name: Ruler of Ice
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Freeze Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Freeze Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Self
 - Grants Effect Hit Rate Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: 46% Effect Hit Rate Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Spike, Gelidus, ice dragons, snow, silence, winter
profile.story: Lania became the true ruler of the Blizzard Plains by protecting the vast icy territory for many, many years.

basicInfo.name: Lania
basicInfo.flavor: Any time a threat to Blizzard Plains arises, Lania summons a blizzard to deal with it.

basicInfo.name: Lania
